# ThemeSwitcher Component

### ThemeSwitcher

**Exports:**
- `ThemeSwitcher` - Theme switcher component (light/dark mode)

**Usage:**
```svelte
<script lang="ts">
	import { ThemeSwitcher } from 'kampsy-ui';
</script>

<ThemeSwitcher />
```

## Installation

```bash
pnpm i -D kampsy-ui@latest
```

## Documentation

Visit http://ui.kampsy.xyz/theme-switcher for full documentation and examples.
